item.title: About Me
item.description:
the escalator pitch

Hi! I’m Karthik, a Computer Science + Psychology Major and Stamps President’s Scholar at Georgia Institute of Technology studying the intersection of cognitive science and artificial intelligence. Specifically, I’m interested in how we can mimic human-like performance with human-like learning, paving the way for more interpretable, energy-efficient, and computationally concise.

In my future, I hope to pursue a Computer Science PhD investigating the extended interpretations of Cognitive Science in a statistical AI context.
